alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 9:57AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Some local flooding begins on rural roads and approaches to bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
